channel.title: Black Screen at startup
channel.description:
Hi all,
When i start the game from steam i get a black screen / no sound and nothing happens.
Usually when i get this it's a resolution problem, but i can't find a way to force the startup res in the config files....
Please Help

item.title: Black Screen at startup
item.dc:creator: guyphs
item.description:
Raminator:

Try right-clicking on Black Mesa in Steam, click on Properties, click on Set Launch Options and add -width x -height y in the dialogue box (where x is your desired horizontal resolution and y is your desired vertical resolution, e.g. -width 1024 -height [noparse]768[/noparse]).

I’m having this same problem – basically it’s a black screen but i can hear the background noise for the menu screen and i can hear the selection noises when i press arrow keys but the screen is black. I tried editing the resolution via the launch properties, but still no dice. Any ideas?

edit: I also tried to run in windowed mode and the window is black, but I can still hear the menu screen
